caption:
Table 2: The MPJPE (mm) of the state-of-the-art methods on the H36M dataset under protocol #1 and protocol #2, respectively. 
* means the method uses temporal information in videos.

caption:
Table 4: Ablative study on the global attention and pair-
wise attention in ContextPose. We show the MPJPE (mm), 
MPLLE (mm) and MPLAE (radian) on each test subject 
separately. ContextPose achieves large improvement on the 
more challenging subject of S9.
